1.content: Update Providers to Use New Repositories
1.details:
1. Update AuthProvider to use UserRepositoryImpl
2. Update CourseProvider to use CourseRepositoryImpl
3. Update SessionProvider to use SessionRepositoryImpl
4. Update MessageProvider to use MessageRepositoryImpl
5. Update NotificationProvider to use NotificationRepositoryImpl
6. Remove old API client dependencies
